Text:
Question about the skins.
I copy all to Skins folder under the Program Files directory.
Now why is it, when I open Powerdvd and go to change the skin, there is always only one there?
I have to merge the reg file for each skin whenever I want to use it, but it always replaces the previous one.
Is that how it is supposed to be, or am I missing something?

It's a bug in PowerDVD 10, it should scan the skin directory and detect the skins, but it doesn't. :S
That's why I created the reg files.

Love the PB one thanks keep up the good work

SEED TILL YOU BLEED!!!
